仺字的基本解释

仺
cāng
古同“仓”。

仺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cāng］
［《廣韻》七岡切，平唐，清。］
“仺1”的今字。“仓1”的繁体字。
(1)贮藏粮食的场所。
(2)匆忙急迫。见“倉卒”、“倉皇”、“倉遽”、“倉迫”。
(3)通“蒼”。青色。
(4)通“蒼”。斑白。
(5)通“滄”。参见“倉海”。
(6)通“艙”。
(7)通“傖”。参见“倉奴”、“倉俗”。
(8)通“臟”。
(9)姓。三国魏有仓慈。见《三国志·魏志·仓慈传》。
[②]［chuàng］
［《集韻》楚亮切，去漾，初。］
“仺2”的今字。通“愴1”。“仓2”的繁体字。
悲伤。参见“倉2兄”。

仺字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　仺； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页94第23
【集韻】倉古作仺。註詳八畫。

仺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
仺字的起名意思

暂无。

I
Basic explanation of words
I
cāng
Gu Tong "cang".
I
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cāng］
["Guangyun" Qigang cut, Ping Tang, Qing. ]
The present character of "仺1". Traditional characters for "仓1".
(1) The place where food is stored.
(2) Hurry and urgency. See "hurriedly", "hurriedly", "cangju", "hurriedly".
(3) Through "Cang". blue.
(4) Through "Cang". gray.
(5) Through "Cang". See "Canghai".
(6) Through the "cabin".
(7) Through "伧". See "Cang Slave", "Cang Su".
(8) Through "dirty".
(9) Last name. Three Kingdoms Wei Youcangci. See "Three Kingdoms·Weizhi·Cangci Biography".
[②]［chuàng］
["Ji Yun" Chu Liang cuts, goes to Yang, early. ]
The present character of "仺2". Linked with "怆1". Traditional characters for "仓2".
sad. See "Cang 2 brother".
I
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　仺; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 94 Page 23
【Jiyun】Canggu made it. Note the eight paintings in detail.
